definitions.definition: To happen by chance, to occur.
definitions.example: It chanced that I found a solution the very next day.
Shall we carry the umbrella, or chance a rainstorm?
He chanced upon a kindly stranger who showed him the way.

definitions.definition: (Belize) To rob, cheat or swindle someone.
definitions.example: The car broke down a week after I bought it. I was chanced by that fast-talking salesman.
